abstract: Israeli military says it is investigating soldier who shot Palestinian assailant in head as he lay motionless on ground; Palestinians claim excessive use of force by Israelis is common, and incident is being investigated only because it was caught on video.
lead_paragraph: Video emerged showing a soldier shooting an assailant in the head as he lay on the road near a Jewish settlement in the West Bank city of Hebron.

headline.main: Israel Begins Murder Investigation of Soldier Who Shot Palestinian
headline.print_headline: Israeli Army Considers Murder Case for Soldier

snippet: Video emerged showing a soldier shooting an assailant in the head as he lay on the road near a Jewish settlement in the West Bank city of Hebron.
